page.title: 16The Weather in Pendock
page.content: The weather in Pendock is very odd and can change in minutes or even seconds. We keep a weather chart and see which way the wind blows.This month it has blown mostly North East which is very odd for June.Three people have been struck by lightning in the last year. The Vicar's wife was and someone else was struck twice the same day. We live below the Malvern Hills so if it is nice on the Hills it is not very nice here and the other way around. Sometimes it will not make up its mind to rain or be sunny. I don't like it cold or when it will not make its mind up. I like warm weather and not winter because in the snow things we make fall down or are pushed down by other people watching. We think the reason we get odd weather is because we are on a plain below the Malvern Hills.
